entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 p.m. EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow or rain beginning early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or rain ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
